str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a primary komeo; properly, to provide for, i.e. to carry off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
